name: Tolong Aku Terkunci
description:
cara bermain:

w - jalan maju

a - jalan kekiri

s - jalan mundur

d - jalan kekanan

Tujuan Dan Misi :

diceritakan seorang anak siswa yang ketiduran dikelas hingga larut malam disebut rendy, si rendy adalah anak siswa kelas 1 dan mengerjakan project sekolah akan tetapi dia sangat kelelahan sehingga ia ketiduran hingga larut malam, saat terbangun dia terkejut karena sadar bahwa dia terkunci dan pak satpam yang menjaga tidak tahu dia masih berada disekolah

misi : mencari 5 kertas untuk keluar

how to play: w - way forward a - walk to the left s - way back d - go right Goals and Missions: told by a student who fell asleep in class late at night called rendy, rendy was a grade 1 student and was working on a school project but he was so tired that he slept until late at night, when he woke up he was shocked to realize that he was locked and the security guard guarding didn't know he was still in school mission: find 5 papers to get out
